reviews.subject: Quantum Mechanics
reviews.review: An excellent professor who makes complex topics understandable. Her lectures are engaging and clear.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Knows the material well, but the lectures can be a bit dry. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Great professor! Assignments are challenging but fair, and she explains concepts very well.

reviews.subject: Operating Systems
reviews.review: The lectures were hard to follow, and the exams were tough. Not very approachable.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: Amazing instructor! She really cares about her students and makes the material accessible.

reviews.subject: Software Engineering
reviews.review: A solid professor with a lot of industry experience. The group projects were very informative.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Lectures were okay, but the labs were poorly organized. Needs improvement.

reviews.subject: Discrete Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Brown's explanations were clear. Good use of examples.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Fantastic course! Dr. Lee is passionate about AI and it shows in her teaching.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: The lectures are monotone, and the material is not engaging. Wouldn't recommend.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: A difficult course, but Dr. Davis tries her best to make it manageable. Prepare to study hard.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is a captivating lecturer with deep knowledge. History comes alive in his class.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Good professor, especially for beginners. The coding assignments were helpful.

reviews.subject: Electrical Circuits
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit scattered. Labs were good.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: A wonderful professor who is passionate about the environment. Very inspiring.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Not very engaging and the exams were tough. The textbook is essential.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Gonzalez is a great lecturer, and the class discussions were always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Decent professor, but the course material is very dense. Labs are essential for understanding.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Excellent professor with a clear passion for psychology. Very engaging lectures.

reviews.subject: Advanced Algorithms
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Dr. Moore's explanations are very thorough.
